segments.text: I'd like to start by talking about prices .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd be glad to answer any questions you may have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your products are very good , but the price you ask is much too high .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you consider our high research costs and excellent quality , the price we are asking is only reasonable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , but we want 1000 pieces . This is a very large order . So , can you give us a 25 percent discount ?
segments.speaker: S1
